name: Tasty
description: API to query data about recipe, plan, ingredients, etc... as on official site

api_methods.name: recipes/list
api_methods.description: List recipes by option filters or name

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Leave empty to sort by popular as default OR one of the following : approved_at:desc|approved_at:asc

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Name of food or, ingredients to search by

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Get suitable values from /tags/list API

api_methods.name: tips/list
api_methods.description: This endpoint is used to load tips (reviews)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The value of recipe id returned in .../recipes/list .../feeds/list .../recipes/list-similarities endpoints

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

api_methods.name: recipes/detail (Deprecated)
api_methods.description: Get  more information of recipe if available, such as : ingredients, nutrition info, preparation, etc...

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id value of any recipe returned in recipes/list API

api_methods.name: feeds/list
api_methods.description: List latest feeds about new food, recipes,etc...

parameters.name: vegetarian
parameters.description: List vegetarian food only

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone of your location in format of +/- hhmm

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

api_methods.name: feeds/list
api_methods.description: List latest feeds about new food, recipes,etc...

parameters.name: vegetarian
parameters.description: List vegetarian food only

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone of your location in format of +/- hhmm

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

api_methods.name: tags/list
api_methods.description: List supported tags name for filtering in recipes/list API

api_methods.name: tags/list
api_methods.description: List supported tags name for filtering in recipes/list API

api_methods.name: recipes/list-similarities
api_methods.description: List similar recipes by specific recipe id

parameters.name: recipe_id
parameters.description: The id value of any recipe returned in recipes/list API

api_methods.name: recipes/auto-complete
api_methods.description: Get auto complete suggestions by name or ingredients

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: Food name or ingredient

api_methods.name: recipes/get-more-info
api_methods.description:
Get  more information of recipe if available, such as : ingredients, nutrition info, preparation, etc... This endpoint returns 404 status code, it means there is no more information to obtain.
* .../recipes/list already returns ingredients, nutrition info, preparation, etc...

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id value of any recipe returned in recipes/list API
